dcterms:description: The Telugu speech corpus consists of 40 hours of read and conversational speech. It has a vocabulary of 43,260 words and a test dataset with an OOV rate of 12.04%. This dataset is considered low resource due to the high OOV rate.
dcterms:title: Telugu speech corpus

dcterms:creator: Samuel Thomas
Sriram Ganapathy
Hynek Hermansky
dcterms:description: The Kannada speech corpus consists of 4 hours of recorded speech using transcripts from a speech synthesis dataset. It has a baseline vocabulary of 1754 words and a test dataset with an OOV rate of 25.22%. This dataset is considered extremely low resource.
dcterms:title: Kannada speech corpus
